name: Feed The Zombies 3D
description:
The game is quite simple. Zombies and brains are spawning on a regular base. Now chase a zombie to a brain. The zombie will eat it and disappear. 

There are two markers showing you where the next zombie/brain will spawn. A red sphere shows the location of the next zombie and a green sphere shows the next brain. 

But be aware to not run into a brain with your character. Brains are only for zombies! Catching a brain will have a negative effect which will slow you down for a while. 

You won't be able to decrease the amount of zombies - but you can try to keep it on a stable level. Every time a zombie eats a brain another zombie will spawn and reset the timer. Again: You don't get rid of a zombie - but you gained time before the next zombie spawns!

Happy Feeding
